mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE ( MESSAGE_NO ,USER_NO ,USER_NO2 ,MESSAGE_CONTENT ,MESSAGE_DATE ,MESSAGE_STATUS ) (SELECT SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, A. * FROM ( SELECT #{ message.userNo } AS USER_NO ,#{ message.userNo2 } AS USER_NO2 ,#{ message.messageContent } AS MESSAGE_CONTENT ,SYSDATE AS MESSAGE_DATE ,0 AS MESSAGE_STATUS FROM DUAL ) A)
mapper.select: SELECT ME.MESSAGE_NO ,ME.USER_NO ,M.USER_ID ,M.NICKNAME ,ME.USER_NO2 ,MM.USER_ID "USER_ID2" ,MM.NICKNAME "NICKNAME2" ,CASE WHEN LENGTH(ME.MESSAGE_CONTENT) <= 10 THEN SUBSTR(ME.MESSAGE_CONTENT,0,10) WHEN LENGTH(ME.MESSAGE_CONTENT) > 10 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTR(ME.MESSAGE_CONTENT,0,10),'...') END AS "TITLE" ,ME.MESSAGE_CONTENT ,MESSAGE_DATE ,MESSAGE_STATUS FROM MESSAGE ME JOIN MEMBER M ON(ME.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN MEMBER MM ON(ME.USER_NO2 = MM.USER_NO) WHERE ME.USER_NO2 = #{ userNo } ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE DESC
